help.description: Gets a list of commands or help for a specific command.

params.name: Designated name of the game. Players use this to identify the game. Must be at least 2 chars long, without any whitespace.
params.privacy: Determines if only you can add players [use 'private'] or anyone can join [use 'public', or nothing.]
params.maxPlayers: Designates a maximum number of players (capped at 8, minimum 4).

params.game: Name of the game to be joined.

join.description: Joins a game, if it is open to joining.

params.game: Name of the game to be left.

leave.description: Leaves a game, if it is not in progress.

params.game: Name of the game for which you are requesting data.

status.description: Views the status of a game.

params.game: Name of the game you are deleting.

delete.description: Deletes a game, if you own it.

params.alias: Name of the alias you are assigning.

alias.description: Takes an alias for yourself, removes an alias you own, or views the current owner of an alias.

params.game: Game you are inviting them to.

invite.description: Invites someone to a game you own, notifying them via DMs.
